description:
Through our office in Golden Valley, Minnesota, Bradshaw & Bryant, PLLC, represents clients in the Twin Cities region and throughout Minnesota who need legal assistance involving a personal injury claim or those who need an effective criminal defense following their arrest. For more than 30 years, our team of experienced attorneys has worked hard to defend the rights and liberties of those we serve, and we have achieved unprecedented success helping our clients obtain the justice they deserve.

If you suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to the careless and negligent acts of another, you can rely on our law firm to advocate for your best interests and obtain the compensation you need to support yourself and your family. Through our personal injury practice, we handle all types of personal injury cases, including:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Uninsured and underinsured drivers
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Premises liability and slip-and-fall accidents
  • Boating, skiing and swimming accidents
  • Accidents that occurred at an amusement park or concert venue
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Sexual abuse injuries
  • Products liability
  • Construction accidents and workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

Along with personal injury, we offer effective defense strategies and aggressive representation for those facing any of the following criminal charges:

  • Assault and battery
  • Theft and burglary
  • Homicide and violent crimes
  • DUI
  • Domestic violence
  • Drug charges
  • White collar crimes
  • Sex crimes
  • Computer crimes

If you have a legal need related to one of our practice areas, you can count on Bradshaw & Bryant, PLLC, to be your trusted legal advocate. Our law firm offers free initial consultations, and we are ready to provide you and your family with the highest level of legal representation possible.
